channel.title: Error compiling my auto miner

item.title: Error compiling my auto miner
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]//------------------TrainerScape/Easter guy1’s First script!--------------------------\
//------------------Script made sunday, March16, 2008!-----------------------------\
//-----------Forums @ http://www.trainerscape.smfforfree4.com-------------\
//—This script drops the ores. im planning on making one that banks!-----\

program AutoMiner;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
orecolor1=5921377;

procedure AutoMiner;
var x, y: Integer; //Find Colour will change x and y to where it finds the colour BECAUSE we put them as the x and y parameters
begin
repeat //xs, ys, xe, ye: Integer make the box to search in, EG, 0, 0, 500, 500 is a box from the topleft corner 500 down and right
//Tolerance: Integer is the tolerance of the colour, 255 is any colour
//color is the colour to serach for, eg, 16777215 for white, Use the colour picker, CTRL + P to pick colours
if findcolorspiraltolerance(x, y, 16777215, 0, 0, 0, 0, 5) then
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
else
wait(500);
until(invfull)
wait(25000) //Wait 25 seconds
if (invfull) then
dropall;
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat
AutoMiner;
until(isfkeydown(10)); //F10 key.
end.[/code]

Also, You had setupsrl; activateclient; repeat AutoMiner; until(isfkeydown(10)); //F10 key.
floating around in no procedure or loop o_O

Read full topic

item.title: Error compiling my auto miner
item.dc:creator: @easter_guy1 easter guy1
item.description:
@easter_guy1 wrote:

[code]//------------------TrainerScape/Easter guy1’s First script!--------------------------\
//------------------Script made sunday, March16, 2008!-----------------------------\
//-----------Forums @ http://www.trainerscape.smfforfree4.com-------------\
//—This script drops the ores. im planning on making one that banks!-----\

program AutoMiner;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
orecolor1=5921377;

procedure AutoMiner;
begin
repeat
function findcolorspiraltolerance(var x, y: Integer; color, xs, ys, xe, ye: Integer; Tolerance: Integer): Boolean;
mouse(x,y,3,3,true);
until(invfull)
wait(25000) //Wait 25 seconds
if (invfull) then
dropall;
end;

setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat
AutoMiner;
until(isfkeydown(10)); //F10 key.

begin
repeat
AutoMiner;
activateclient;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Thats my script

this is the error:

Failed when compiling Line 432: [Hint] (10382:1): Variable 'OLDMS' never used in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\SRL/SRL/Core/AntiRandoms/AntiRandoms.scar Line 16: [Error] (12283:1): Identifier expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\Scripts\TrainerScape's AutoMiner.scar

Read full topic
